name: Robotic Specimen Collector
description:
Top-down shooter where you knock out aliens and collect them so the scientists can examine them. Lots of shooting and explosions!

Made during WeeklyGameJam #34

Code: Martin Enderleit (menderleit.itch.io)

Art: Jack Pressnell (somefarang.itch.io)

Font: Daniel Linssen (managore.itch.io)

Source code: https://github.com/eLeit/rsc-game
